sense.def:
Izraz
unusually
pomeni, da je nekaj večje kot navadno ali da ima neko lastnost v večjem obsegu kot navadno.

seg.quote: ...a clump of weed that seemed unusually large.
October has been unusually wet and cold.

sense.def:
Izraz
unusually
pomeni tudi, da je nekaj drugačno kot navadno.

seg.quote: The service charge, unusually, is 10 per cent.
